Journey Capture - Explore, Document, Annotate.

Journey Capture is a powerful tool for exploratory testing and journey mapping, designed to help users capture, organise, and annotate their web experiences. Whether you’re documenting a complex web interaction or simply capturing a page for later review, Journey Capture provides all the tools you need.

Key Features:
➤ Create a Journey: Start a new journey with multiple web page captures. Each capture includes a screenshot, system information, network logs, and optional notes or titles.

➤ Screenshot Annotation: Annotate screenshots directly, in the extension using the annotation tools, available in multiple colours. Highlight important elements or areas of interest on each capture.

➤ System Information Capture: Along with screenshots, Journey Capture automatically logs essential system information such as screen resolution, operating system, browser version, whether JavaScript is enabled, cookie status, and more. Ideal for bug reporting and detailed documentation.

➤ Network Log Tracking: Keep track of network logs at the moment of capture. Easily search and filter logs to review requests, responses, and potential issues in web performance or behaviour.

➤ Download and Share Journeys: Export entire journeys, including captures, screenshots, system info, and network logs, into a JSON file or a comprehensive PDF report. Share with your team or import journeys back into the extension for further annotation and review.

➤ Import Journeys: Load previously saved journeys to continue annotations or review past captures. Perfect for collaboration or simply resuming work where you left off.

Perfect for:

➤ Exploratory Testing: Map out and document testing processes for more effective web debugging.

➤ Bug Reporting: Capture specific errors, user interactions, or interface issues and share them with your development team.

➤ Journey Mapping: Visualise customer journeys or UX paths by tracking user interactions and system performance.

Journey Capture is a versatile extension built for testers, developers, and anyone who needs to document complex web processes with ease.
